Base64 Encoded Strings:
1. SGVsbG8gd29ybGQ= # Hello world
2. YW5vdGhlciBlbmNvZGVkIHN0cmluZw== # Another encoded string 
3. VGVzdCBmb3Igc2NyaXB0 # Test for script

Hexadecimal Encoded Strings:
1. 48656c6c6f20576f726c64 # Hello World
2. 546869732069732061207465737420666f722074686520736372697074 # This is a test for the script
3. 616e6f746865722068657820737472696e67 # another hex string

URL Encoded Strings:
1. https%3A%2F%2Fwww.example.com%2Fpath%3Fquery%3Dvalue # https://www.example.com/path?query=value
2. https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sample.com%2Ffind%3Fbook%3DHarry%20Potter%26author%3DJ.K.%20Rowling # https://www.sample.com/find?book=Harry Potter&author=J.K. Rowling
3. https%3A%2F%2Fwww.webstore.com%2Fproduct%3Fitem%3Dsmartphone%26brand%3DBrandName%26model%3DX-200 # https://www.webstore.com/product?item=smartphone&brand=BrandName&model=X-200

Binary Encoded Strings:
1. 0100100001100101011011000110110001101111001000000111011101101111011100100110110001100100 # Hello World
2. 0101010001101000011010010111001100100000011010010111001100100000011000010010000001110100011001010111001101110100001000000110011001101111011100100010000001110100011010000110010100100000011100110110001101110010011010010111000001110100 # This is a test for the script
3. 011000010110111001101111011101000110100001100101011100100010000001110100011001010111001101110100001000000111001101110100011100100110100101101110011001110010000001100110011011110111001000100000011000100110100101101110011000010111001001111001 # another test string for binary
